section.p: provides detailed procedures for installing and configuring a cluster. Before using this guide, carefully review the .
customers: This guide does not include procedures for installing a high-availability deployment. For additional information, please contact your representative.

section.title: Supported clients and browsers
section.p: The following table identifies the supported combinations of client operating systems and web browsers.

section.title: Change history
section.p: The following list associates document part numbers and the important changes to this guide since the previous release. Some of the changes involve features or content, but others do not. For information about new or changed features, refer to the .

dlentry.dd: Modify the step for configuring Docker Engine on master hosts. The --insecure-registry flag is only needed on delegate hosts.
Add clarification that offline installations must be performed completely offline.
Add procedure for adding delegates when using network address translation (NAT).
Remove TLS_RSA_WITH_RC4_128_SHA from list of ciphers associated with SERVICED_TLS_CIPHERS.
Minor changes to synchronize with the Upgrade Guide.
Add steps to download and use the serviced RPM file ( customers only).
Add procedures for importing the ZooKeeper image file on offline nodes ( customers only).
Add new best practice guideline for managing configuration files.
